name: Lost In Space (Demo)
description:
- IDEA : A game About Astronaut lost in space , in a Multiverses of each Level . 

- I tried to Experiment more with Inverse Game mechanics , so instead of Game based on Player Movement its based on Platform Movement Moslty , and with 2d Physics.

- CONTROLS : Use mouse to drag platforms , and Arrows to Move Player Left and Right.

- this is a demo of 4 Levels.
